_learningOutcomes.outcome: Identify the stages and time requirements of an investigative open data project
Identify a number of different errors that exist in data.
Clean a dataset.
Enrich a dataset with available open data.
Evaluate how emerging technologies can promote fast innovation and enable required change in business models
Describe the key benefits of visulising open data
Describe a number of key data visualisations
Differentiate between the various goals of visualising open data
Select the appropriate set of goals for specific open data visulisations
Describe a number of techniques for visulising different formats and structures of data
Describe the role of cognitive science in data visualisation
Critically evaluate how the human brain interprets information presented visually
Evaluate the effectiveness of pop-out in data visulisation
Evaluate the use of colour in visulising data
Describe the problems and potential solutions for visualising high dimension datasets
Describe the techniques for visulising temporal data
Apply your knowledge of visualisation techniques to identify those which deliberately attempt to mislead their audience
Create a heatmap visulisation of education open data
Create an interactive spatial visulisation of open election data
Create an interactive treemap visualisation for open spending data

_resourcesItems.title: Visualising open data
_resourcesItems.description: Introduction to information graphics and data visualisation

_resourcesItems.title: Open Refine
_resourcesItems.description: The Open Refine tool is a powerful tool for cleaning messy data

_resourcesItems.title: CSV Lint
_resourcesItems.description: CSVLint helps you to check that your CSV open data file is readable

_resourcesItems.title: CSV Dataset Health Checker
_resourcesItems.description: The CSV dataset health checker is a simple way to check how many variations a CSV open dataset has gone through and whether all of the files are the same or different

_resourcesItems.title: JSON Lint
_resourcesItems.description: JSONLint helps you to check that your JSON open data file is readable

_resourcesItems.title: Flight patterns
